# Government Tender Announcement
=====================================

**Job Title:** RFI - SIGMA PROFESSIONAL SERVICES
**Job Reference:** WS4151696836-Doc4151745315

## Tender Overview

The Government of Canada's Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites interested contractors to submit a request for information (RFI) in response to the ongoing procurement of professional services, including IT management, for the SIGMA project. 

### Tender Details
-----------------

*   **Tender Status:** Expired (not applicable for quotation purposes)
*   **Publication Date:** August 18, 2023
*   **Submission Deadline:** The submission deadline for this tender has now expired, and it is no longer open to quotations.
*   **Contract Value:** Estimated total budget for this contract is estimated to be $180,000.
*   **Term and Delivery Timeframe:** The expected contract start date is March 22, 2024, with no specified expected end date.
*   **Reporting and Delivery Requirements:** Tenders will be evaluated using the Combined Rating System, combining the rating of both Technical Merit and Price.
*   **Trade Agreements:** This procurement is subject to trade agreements CPFTA / CPTPP - Canada-HO and NAFTA agreements.
*   **Delivery Locations:** This project will be delivering services in the National Capital Region (RCN)

## Tendering Method
-------------------

*   **Quoting Method:** Competitive Quoting
*   **Quoting Procedure:** Written Quoting
*   **Ordering Matters Preferred:** The PSPC prefers orders issued according to the above procedure, and any deviation to this procedure must have the prior approval of the department.

## Evaluation and Reporting
---------------------------

*   **Evaluation Procedure:** The evaluation committee will consider all quotations based on the technical merits of the services offered and the overall price of the services.

## Contact Information
---------------------

*   **Name:** Hicham Laassouli
*   **Title:** Procurement Manager
*   **Agency:** Public Services & Procurement Canada (PSPC)
